overview: Damon Blue is a hot shot business executive who decides to take a stroll around Indianapolis. Adrian, an outcast who sees everything with a critical eye, just so happens takes a trip downtown at the same time. Bumping into each other periodically throughout the day, the two decide to go out of their comfort zone and go on an adventure that they will surely never forget.
tagline: A love letter to the city we hate
title: Diet Chicago
